alert.note: Alert for Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:29PM CDT until July 27 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kanabec County in east central Minnesota... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Isle, or 18 miles west of Hinckley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Kanabec County, including the following locations... Snake River State Forest and Warman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
